title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after reimporting
OB: After importing an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view, the image cannot be refreshed when attempting to import it again.
EB: After importing an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view, the image should be refreshed and updated when attempting to import it again.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Import an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view. 2. Delete this image file from the outline image. 3. Rename 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg'. 4. Attempt to import the renamed image 'image1.jpg' into the layout view again.
